entries.meaning: (slang, derogatory) A narcotics addict, especially a heroin user.
examples: Synonyms: drug addict; see also Thesaurus:addict

entries.meaning: (slang, by extension) An enthusiast of something.
examples: Synonyms: aficionado, enthusiast; see also Thesaurus:enthusiast
English people are travel junkies, but Americans hardly ever leave their state.
My uncle is a classic-car junkie.
